fixed_skill.desc: Deal Gun damage to all foes equal to 23.4%/25.5%/27.7% of Attack (3 hits). If a foe is Marked, increase damage by 30.0%/32.7%/35.4% and critical damage by 36.0%/39.2%/42.5%.
fixed_skill.name: Bullet Time

passive_skill.desc: When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Hunting

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate and critical damage 7.5%.
passive_skill.name: Hunting V

passive_skill.desc: When attacking a foe Marked by the user, deal bonus Gun damage equal to 20% of Attack.
passive_skill.name: Hunting VI

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
